title: Rosetta CSV Validation Schema - Archives NZ
description: Draft schema for validating CSV files for ingest in Rosetta at Archives New Zealand.

fields.name: Object Type
fields.description: The type of object we're describing in the row.

fields.name: SIP Title
fields.description: Title of the SIP to ingest.

fields.name: Title
fields.description: Title of the digital object being uploaded.

fields.name: Access
fields.description: Rosetta access restriction key.

fields.name: Archway Identifier for publishing
fields.description: Record number in Archive New Zealand's catalogue.

fields.name: Archway Identifier Type
fields.description: Type of identifier used in Archive New Zealand's catalogue.

fields.name: Archway Identifier Value
fields.description: Record number in Archive New Zealand's catalogue.

fields.name: Series
fields.description: Series number identifier as denoted by Archive New Zealand's catalogue.

fields.name: Agency
fields.description: Code for originating agency, e.g. Archives New Zealand: AEZB.

fields.name: Entity Type
fields.description: Essence of the content found in the digital object.

fields.name: Submission Reason
fields.description: Overarching reason for submission into Rosetta, e.g. Digital Transfer.

fields.name: Event Identifier Type
fields.description: Type of event ID we're assigning. This will always be EXTERNAL in CSV

fields.name: Event Identifier Value
fields.description: Unique ID for the event for this object within this SIP. We can only have on event.

fields.name: Event Type
fields.description: Type of event we're documenting. This will always be CREATION at the moment in CSV.

fields.name: Event Description
fields.description: Description of the event. Workarounds mean that this will always be Provenance Note catch-all in CSV.

fields.name: Event Date
fields.description: Date the event happens. ISO8601: {YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss}.

fields.name: Event Outcome1
fields.description: Status of the outcome of the event happening. E.g. SUCCESS or FAILURE. Will always be SUCCESS.

fields.name: Event Outcome Detail1
fields.description: Description of the event being listed under Provenance Note.

fields.name: Event Outcome Detail Extension1
fields.description: Additional information for description of the event being listed under Provenance Note.

fields.name: Event Outcome2
fields.description: Status of the outcome of the event happening. E.g. SUCCESS or FAILURE. Will always be SUCCESS.

fields.name: Event Outcome Detail2
fields.description: Description of the event being listed under Provenance Note.

fields.name: Event Outcome Detail Extension2
fields.description: Additional information for description of the event being listed under Provenance Note.

fields.name: Event Outcome3
fields.description: Status of the outcome of the event happening. E.g. SUCCESS or FAILURE. Will always be SUCCESS.

fields.name: Event Outcome Detail3
fields.description: Description of the event being listed under Provenance Note.

fields.name: Event Outcome Detail Extension3
fields.description: Additional information for description of the event being listed under Provenance Note.

fields.name: Revision Number
fields.description: Version of the file to be uploaded.

fields.name: Usage Type
fields.description: What we can do with file instance in Rosetta, e.g. VIEW.

fields.name: Preservation Type
fields.description: Preservation purpose of file instance in Rosetta, e.g. Preservation Master.

fields.name: Digital Original
fields.description: Specifiying whether this is a digital original or not (Born Digital vs. Digitised).

fields.name: File Location
fields.description: Directory path to location of file to be uploaded. Path begins at root of ZIP and does not begin with an opening slash. Does not contain filename

fields.name: File Original Path
fields.description: File path to location of file to be uploaded. Path begins at root of ZIP and does not begin with an opening slash.

fields.name: File Name
fields.description: File name, including extension, of file to be uploaded.

fields.name: File fixity type
fields.description: Checksum type to be used to validate integrity of file to be uploaded.

fields.name: File fixity value
fields.description: Hash generated for the file to be uploaded.
